title: Project Lifecycle Management in Hyundai Mobis
overviewContent: I developed key components of the Project Lifecycle Management system by customising the Enovia solution for Hyundai Mobis. This involved tailoring the software to meet the specific needs of the organisation, ensuring that it effectively supports project planning, execution, and monitoring.

skills: Programming: Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery
jd: Analysed the Enovia framework of Dassault Systems.
Developed Bill Of Materials (BOM) and Engineering Order (EO) by customising the Enovia solution.
Conducted unit testing and integration testing.
Assisted in writing technical documentation and end-user manuals
